internationalizations.description:
I have always been captivated by the world of coding, starting from my early days in middle school. Since then, my passion for programming has only grown stronger. Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Physics at Brandeis University, I have honed my skills through a diverse range of coursework and maintained an impressive GPA.

Beyond my academic achievements, I have gained practical experience that showcases my abilities. As a Website Editor at the Crown Center for Middle East Studies, I collaborated with a team to enhance website features, while my role as a Teaching Assistant allowed me to share my knowledge with others. Additionally, my internship as a Software Engineer provided me with real-world experience, where I contributed to developing innovative solutions.

Continuously seeking new challenges, I have embarked on various projects that demonstrate my proficiency in cutting-edge technologies. By developing web applications and leveraging AI capabilities, I have showcased my passion for pushing boundaries and delivering valuable user experiences.

Driven by curiosity and a determination to excel, I am eager to explore new opportunities and collaborate with talented individuals in the field of computer science. I am committed to making a meaningful contribution to the ever-evolving world of technology.
